channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: An Exact Solution Approach for Hierarchical Clustering (Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W. and van de Velden, M.) - Submitted Ultrametric Factor Analysis (Bottazzi Schenone, M., Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.) - Submitted A new distance function that combines numerical and categorical variables (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.)

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C. A general framework for implementing distances for categorical variables Pattern Recognition, 153, 110547, (2024) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Parsimonious Ultrametric Gaussian Mixture Models Statistics and Computing, 34, 108, (2024) Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P. A new ranking calculation based on a composite indicator model: the case of the top 20 European football teams
